elements.label: The Bishop
elements.description: The bishop looks peaceful and quiet. They have a chest wound, and a brooch.

elements.label: The Knight
elements.description: The knight is currently without land and wealth. Their eyes tell a thousand stories.

slots.label: Companion
slots.description: The knight should invite the soldier to come along.

elements.label: The Scribe
elements.description: The scribe is familiar with Latin, the absurdity of indulgence, and which frying fish is the most delicious.

elements.label: The Taverner
elements.description: The taverner owns the tavern by the harbor, a cat named Nora, and a secret frying-fish recipe.

elements.label: The Doctor
elements.description: The doctor used to study in the local monastic school. They finished university recently and came back.

elements.label: The Prior
elements.description: The prior comes from a wealthy family in a foreign land. They are charismatic and diligent.
